name: Alexandra Smith
title: Senior Software Engineer
summary: Experienced software engineer with 8+ years of expertise in full-stack development, cloud architecture, and building scalable systems. Passionate about creating elegant solutions to complex problems and mentoring junior developers.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
responsibilities: Led development of microservices architecture serving 10M+ daily users
Designed and implemented real-time data processing pipeline using Kafka and Python
Mentored team of 5 junior engineers and conducted code reviews
Reduced API response time by 40% through optimization and caching strategies

experience.title: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Built RESTful APIs using Python, FastAPI, and PostgreSQL
Implemented CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions and Docker
Developed front-end features using React and TypeScript
Collaborated with product team to design and ship new features

experience.title: Junior Developer
responsibilities: Developed client websites using Django and JavaScript
Worked with designers to implement responsive UI components

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

projects.name: Open Source Contribution - FastAPI Plugins

projects.name: Personal Project - Task Management API
